transcript:
Customer: Hello. 
Executive: Sir phone disconnect ho gaya tha. Maine sir JK Enterprises check kiya sir Pune se koi company ka record nahi check kar paya.
Customer: Nahi nahi ye Vapi ka hai.
Executive: Ek minute JK Enterprises.

Customer: Sir kafi sare accounts matlab free listed mein hai to wo aise check nahi ho payega shayad aap number ya kuch bata paye to.
Customer: Ek minute na chalu rakhiye iska number.
Executive: Ji ji bilkul.
Customer: 9574109889.
Executive: Ek minute sir 95.
Customer: 7410.
Executive: 7410 ji.
Customer: 9889.
Executive: 9889. Sir inki service to chal rahi matlab star services mein chali hui hai sir band nahi hui hai. 
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Chali hui hai 2026 tak package chal raha hai main aapko bhej.
Customer: To hai usme usme return bhi aaya hua hai na theek hai.
Executive: Sir nahi aaya sir dekhiye na sir aap aapko main bhej rahi hu.
Customer: Ek minute chalu rakhiye.
Executive: Ji.

Customer: Number kaunsa hai 23050.
Executive: Ek minute main bata rahi hu na sir aapko.

Executive: Inki star service chali hui hai sir hamare sath.
Customer: Main check kar leta hu na aapke number mere paas agar hai to.

Executive: Dekho sir maine bheja hai aapko screenshot check kariye aap.
Customer: Inki ye to paid client hai sir hamare.
Customer: Ha abhi tak mere paas ye save tha file abhi abhi thode din pehle hi maine delete mari hai sab sare kya. 
Customer: Kya.
Customer: Char voucher hai uske char voucher return aaye hue hai payment ke.
Executive: Sir unhone kuch excess amount pay kiya hoga ya kuch unko unhone deal.
Customer: Refund hai.
Executive: Sir main aapko galat nahi bolungi aap ye bhi to dekho na sir unki star service August 2026 tak already chali hui hai aur.
Customer: 434 theek hai main dekhta hu abhi yaha pe milega na to.
Customer: Wahi dhund raha hu.
Executive: Sir ye active account hai aap aap inka account check kar lijiye ye active account hai.
Executive: Ye koi refund ho sakta hai sir inhone kisi service ke against mein matlab jyada paisa kiya ho ya convert karaya ho to uska refund liya hoga inhone.
Customer: Download hi ho raha hai mera ek minute chalu rakhiye download nahi ho raha abhi kya warna main aapko bata deta ki kya hua hai.
Customer: File mera download nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir main mana nahi kar rahi hu but ye account paid hai already premium service mein chal chal raha hai ye account to bataye sir aisa agar refund matlab aap ho sakta hai aap kisi refund ki baat kar rahe ho kuch excess amount raha ho ya deal mein kuch difference amount raha ho wo unka hua hoga but abhi jo inki service chal rahi hai sir wo star service mein chal rahi hai aur wo bhi active services ke sath inka account running hai hamare sath aur aap check bhi kar sakte ho sir ye matlab paid client hai hamare star supplier mein.
Customer: Ha wo main wo wahi wo star service hai na wahi usne return karwaya hua hai mere ko malum hai. 
Customer: Sir.
Customer: Aap chaho to usko direct phone karo meri baat suno abhi aap aapko itna bharosa hai na aap usko phone karo ki bhai tere paas kaisa review hai.
Executive: Sir main kisi alag customer ko call nahi kar sakti hu mere record mein jab main check kar sakti hu ki service active hai to main usko deactivate service kaise man lu sir ye to active plan hai na.
Customer: Main aapko usko ye bande ko phone karke confirm karao conference mein kitna refund liya hua hai.
Executive: Sir unhone main mana nahi kar rahi hu sir but abhi ye account active hai aur star service ke sath chal raha hai.
Customer: Account active hai main mana nahi kar raha hu account active hai lekin usne paisa refund liya hua hai kuch extra service liya tha na uska pura wo refund liya hua hai jisme usko jo bola gaya tha na commitment ki ye service mein ye milega ye service mein ye milega wo nahi mila tha.
Customer: Mere paas ye file download nahi ho raha warna main aapko pura bata deta kacha chitha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Mera whatsapp download nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir main samajh gayi aapki baat lekin please aap bhi thoda sa understand kariye wo cheez matlab wo maine sirf aapke satisfaction ke liye check kar liya but sir.
Customer: Mere satisfaction ke liye mat check karo madam aap aapke mere ko to malum hai ye return liya hua hai.
Executive: Sir sir dekho ho sakta hai unhone liya ho return but main main abhi aapko bata rahi hu sir hamari service pe abhi jitn applied nahi ho sakta hai sir aapko service users ke liye main jo bhi aapko account update karana hai changes chahiye wo main aapko sab kara ke de sakti hu sir plus mein aap chahe to.
Customer: Ek minute chalu rakhiye mere ko mil gaya sara. 

Customer: Whatsapp number kaunsa tha ye 23 wala.
Executive: Sir maine dekh liya hai inhone September 2024 mein inki jo service thi wo I am matlab I am star thi jo abhi inki preferred star service chal rahi hai uske against mein kyuki wo inke liye working worth it matlab working nahi kar raha tha to inhone plan ko uska refund leke plan ko convert kara liya hai apna dusre plan mein matlab inka abhi preferred star chal raha hai to basic service inki kabhi download nahi hui thi aapka to plan hi basic chal raha hai na sir.
Customer: Ye aapka ye main aapko bata du itna ek hai aapka.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Total char credit note bana hua hai.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Total char credit note bana hua hai IndiaMART ka ek hai 57 5738 second hai 29500.
Customer: Sir main sir refund main ye thodi na bol rahi hu ki refund nahi hua hoga refund mein star services ka unki dusri I am star chal rahi thi abhi preferred liya inhone wo ho sakta hai wo service unka plan unke liye work na kar raha ho sir abhi unhone lekin unka abhi usse bhi better plan mein hai preferred chal raha hai unka preferred star chal raha hai aur basic service unki kabhi download matlab kabhi band nahi hui thi wo abhi bhi paid account mein hai aur tabhi bhi wo paid account mein the jab unhone service liya tha wo sir listing service download karai thi unhone kyuki wo unko shayad utna work nahi kar rahi thi but sir aapka to basic plan hi hai na TrustSeal ke sath aap isko kaise band kara bataye isko kaise band karte the sir bataye.

Customer: Se baat nahi.
Executive: Aur main aapko export mein convert karne ka option de rahi hu na sir aap export mein convert kar.
Customer: Aap jo bol rahe ho ye bande ne pura total 5738 5738 29500 29500 70477 return liya hua hai.
Executive: Sir wo star service ka refund.
Customer: Abhi main abhi aapko aapka concern hai na abhi is time wo ye jab bhi ye cancel ke liye bola na to is bande ne bhi kareeban ek mahina mehnat kiya kitna ek mahina complaint phone pe phone mail pe mail tabhi jaake ye hua aap bol rahe ho na ki service convert karwaya wo nahi kiya hai.
Executive: Sir unhone abhi jo star chal raha hai unhone wo total listing karwaya tha kyuki unke liye work nahi ho raha hoga kyuki wo city wise plan tha abhi unka plan chal raha hai sir.
Customer: Meri baat suniye aapko.
Customer: Ha wahi main bol raha hu.
Customer: Abhi unka all over India wala plan chal raha hai pehle city based tha to wo unke liye work nahi kar raha hoga sir.
Customer: To work madam aap aap abhi bhi ye plan bhi work nahi kar raha hai aapko chahiye usko bolo abhi aapko conference kara du madam.
Executive: Sir dekhiye main main us account ko manage nahi karti hu main uske liye responsible nahi hu sir maine sirf aapko information diya hai.
Customer: To aap bol rahe ho ki wo account mere paas nahi hai.
Executive: Sir nahi uski responsibility nahi le sakte ho na sir main us account ki main to aapke account ke regarding bata sakti hu na aapko cheeze.
Customer: Aap mere account mein bhi to madam business nahi aa raha hai na.
Executive: Sir dekho main aapko business aa jayega agar aap service use karoge agar aap service use nahi karoge sir to business sir dekho aap chahe listing plan le lijiye ya koi bhi plan le lijiye aap usme services use kare bina aap kuch nahi kar payenge jinki aap baat bata rahe hai na sir same product line hai wo 30 mein se na 28 days service ko use kar rahe hai sir agar aap ye bol rahe ho ki unka aur aapki services same hai aur unke sath ye cheeze apply hui thi to unka current status dekhiye sir wo 30 mein se 28 days service use kar rahe hai aur itni service use kar rahe hai to sir benefit bhi mil raha hoga 26 customer ne unko review rating bhi kiya hai sir aap meri baat suniye main abhi samne call kar lete hai na.
Executive: Sir nahi sir main us account pe baat nahi kar sakti hu aap samajhne ki koshish kijiye main us account ko manage nahi karti hu kyuki wo wo bande ko wapi mein lane wala hi main khud hu.
Executive: Bahut achchi baat hai sir.
Customer: Aap jo bol rahe ho na us bande ko wapi mein lane wala hu main hu uska business setup karane wala main hu IndiaMART usne apne aap se kiya hai lekin usne pehle extra paisa dal diya tha wo refund liya tha uske baad aur extra payment kiya hai na sir refund karne ke baad aap dekho na sir preferred star ka jo payment hai minimum matlab unki matlab ek category sir dedh do lakh se kam nahi hoti hai aur.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states JK Enterprises record not found.

- Customer claims another client received refund.

- Customer says business is not coming through his account.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed JK Enterprises is from Vapi.

- Executive confirmed client has active Star service.

- Executive offered to help update account.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, star service, account status
